Class CardState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.state.CardState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbandonedShipAnnounceState, AbandonedShipRewardState, AbandonedStationAnnounceState, AbandonedStationRewardState, CombatZoneAnnounceState, CombatZonePenaltyState, CombatZoneSelectShipState, EpidemicState, MeteorAnnounceState, MeteorSelectShipState, OpenSpaceState, PiratesAnnounceState, PiratesPenaltyState, PiratesRewardState, PiratesSelectShipState, PlanetAnnounceState, PlanetRewardState, SelectShipReconnectState, SlaversAnnounceState, SlaversLoseState, SlaversRewardState, SmugglersAnnounceState, SmugglersLoseState, SmugglersRewardState, StardustState
public abstract class CardState extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class representing a State of the Card.

      public void init(ClientState new_state)
      Called when the card state is initialized. Resets power for all players ships.
      Parameters:
      new_state - ClientState The new client state to broadcast to all connected listeners.
